title: Disconnected and Given a loss
body: I played a ranked solo/duo match and was given a loss after being disconnected from the game. I couldnt open my client until after the match had ended. The player i entered with went 12-0 and won the game. I was given my first loss of the season due to this bug

replies.body: It sucks that a disconnection occurred while you were doing so well.  Per the [Leaverbuster FAQ,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q1) getting marked as a leaver results in a loss for that player, which is the case for that match.  If you're having any connection issues, let me know and I'll try to help!
